articles.title: Archaeologists are losing it over Virgin Galactic's latest spaceflight - BGR
articles.description: A Virgin Galactic flight last week took ancient-human fossils into space, sparking outrage from archaeologists around the world.

articles.title: This Ancient Life-Form Outlasted The Dinosaurs, And It May Bury Us Too - ScienceAlert
articles.description: If you looked up 66 million years ago you might have seen, for a split second, a bright light as a mountain-sized asteroid burned through the atmosphere and smashed into Earth.
